title: Will V.S. return?
body:
Will V.S. return back? I got 40 CHAOS TOKENS and 260 ORDER TOKENS :( but don't have any mission. Can I exchange 20 TOKENS to THE ORTHER? 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Vs may or may not come back in the future, but rest assured that we'll be doing more fun events like this for missions in the future! On that token note, there might be something we could work out if you hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
